path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Dradex Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Liquidity can be added below `MINIMUM_LIQUIDITY`
findings.description: The `add_liquidity` function allows users to bypass the `MINIMUM_LIQUIDITY` requirement by adding enough liquidity and then removing it to reduce the liquidity below the minimum threshold.
